Amy Bishop pleads guilty in fatal shootings in Alabama

Prosecutors agreed to recommend four life sentences in the February 2010 shooting of six, three fatally, on a Huntsville, Ala., campus by Braintree native Amy Bishop. (AP)

1 American dead, 1 wounded in Libya

An American consulate employee has been shot dead and another wounded in the hand during an attack at a US consulate, a Libyan security official said. (AP)

The new $34 million home for the Mattapan Community Health Center will double the number of patients the facility serves, officials said.
